entry.title: In Memory of Anton Logvynenko: Digital Artist & Aviation Enthusiast
entry.summary: The team at Microsoft Flight Simulator would like to take a moment to pay our condolences and provide tribute to a beloved member of the flight sim community – Anton Logvynenko, who passed away while carrying out a combat mission in the Kharkiv region on November 27, 2023.

entry.title: April 11th, 2024 – Development Update
entry.summary: This week, we’re pleased to share an updated Development Roadmap which you can find below. A few highlights include: – City Update 06: Southwest Germany and Local Legend 15: Dornier Do 31 are both releasing next week on April 17! – Sim Update 15 and the Airbus A320neo (V2) are tentatively targeted for a full release on April 30.
